name: THERE IS NO GAME! JAM EDITION
name_original: THERE IS NO GAME! JAM EDITION
description:
THERE IS NO GAME! JAM EDITION

This project is by @zaamtoalt

Orginal  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/652188199/

A little game that’s not a game, winner of an old game jam that nobody’s ever heard of. So don’t install it!

I told you there is no game!

It's not like it’s a Point&Click that won the 2015 Construct Deception Jam, or that millions of people have tried it.

Of course not!

And if you’ve never heard of it, now’s the perfect time to go for a walk, read a book... or something…

WEAK POINTS:

-It's free, which is a problem when you go to ask for a refund.

-The voice-over acting is pathetic.

-Two different endings you’ll never even get to because you’re not going to install it.

HIGHLIGHTS:

-Since there's no game, you'll be saving a lot of time.

Isn't that great?

WINNER of the DeceptionJam in 2015.

This non-game has not been remade with a new game engine for better performances.
And we haven't included some new enhanced graphics and new voices.

If the game seems too slow, you can switch off the CRT effect in the options to improve the frame rate.

There is no game. There is nothing to do.
Do not tap anywhere. Really. DO NOT TAP ANYWHERE.
Do not laugh as there is nothing to laugh about.

Don't try to touch your mobile screen.
It's at your own risk!!

There is no game !

Voice : English
Subtitles : English/French
